name: Out Of Time (itch) (Ⓔⓡⓘⓒ)
description:
Created for the Spring 2022 IGDA Game Jam with the themes "Time Shenanigans" and "The Space Between"

People have been performing time-related experiments on you, leaving you out of sync with the rest of the world. Use this to your advantage to escape your containment facility!

Controls
A, Left Arrow - Move Left
D, Right Arrow - Move Right
Space - Jump
Escape Key - Go back to title screen from credits screen
Untested Controller Support As Well!

Credits:
Crumbled Pixels Font - Alyssa Diaz
[License] Clock Ticking - christoph
Music made in BeepBox.co
Game made in Godot Engine
Sprites made in Aseprite
